name: Kiranmayee Rongali
position: Top PM Fellow at NextLeap | MC Delivery Associate at Accenture Strategy | McKinsey NGWL'22 | IIT Kharagpur'22
about: A recent graduate student from the batch of 2022 at the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. Pursued major in Mechanical Engineering with a micro specialization in entrepreneurship and innovation. An enthusiastic person interested in Product Management, Data Science and AI, who wishes to take active participation in events, has good communication skills and management skills. Has good knowledge of C++, and Python and is curious about startups and entrepreneurship.

current_company.name: Accenture
current_company.title: Top PM Fellow at NextLeap | MC Delivery Associate at Accenture Strategy | McKinsey NGWL'22 | IIT Kharagpur'22

experience.title: Next Generation Women Leader APAC'22
experience.description: A two-day virtual event consisting of many sessions with young women leaders from McKinsey & Company, engaging activities between the participants from the South-Asia Pacific region. Taken lots of insights and learnings about leadership, self-awareness and women empowerment from these interactions.
experience.description_html: A two-day virtual event consisting of many sessions with young women leaders from McKinsey & Company, engaging activities between the participants from the South-Asia Pacific region. Taken lots of insights and learnings about leadership, self-awareness and women empowerment from these interactions. <!---->

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: Developed a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) for US Health Plan Managers to improve the Health Plan ratings using data analytics• Identified the target market, profiled each market segment, and analyzed the competitive landscape and positioning of the product in the US• Webscraped data of 1000+ health plans, with 48 measures and classified into 4 categories, best to poor performing plans to analyze data• Performed statistical analysis using T-test and Mann-Whitney test on the predictions generated by an ordinal logistic regression model• Built an ensemble using XGBoost and SVM classifier with 98% accuracy to predict target measures for the highest rating increment• Created an ML model for priority measure identification from 48 measures and estimated additional members the plans should target• Integrated the ML model to a UI by creating a webpage using Bootstrap 4 and automated manual processes for audit, testing, etc.
experience.description_html: Developed a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) for US Health Plan Managers to improve the Health Plan ratings using data analytics• Identified the target market, profiled each market segment, and analyzed the competitive landscape and positioning of the product in the US• Webscraped data of 1000+ health plans, with 48 measures and classified into 4 categories, best to poor performing plans to analyze data• Performed statistical analysis using T-test and Mann-Whitney test on the predictions generated by an ordinal logistic regression model• Built an ensemble using XGBoost and SVM classifier with 98% accuracy to predict target measures for the highest rating increment• Created an ML model for priority measure identification from 48 measures and estimated additional members the plans should target• Integrated the ML model to a UI by creating a webpage using Bootstrap 4 and automated manual processes for audit, testing, etc.

experience.title: Core committee member, publicity and sponsorship team
experience.description: • Organized a 9-day event, 54th Inter IIT Sports Meet and 35th Aquatics Meet, witnessing a footfall of 3500+ students from 23 IITs• Raised sponsorship amount of INR 35.5 lakh collectively through Corporate Engagement Program and Alumni Funding for the meet• Responsible for Publicity and Branding of 45 companies on three fronts - Pre-Meet, During-Meet and Post-Meet Publicity of sports meet• Orchestrated 4 cultural festive nights and 3 guest lectures including International celebrities and introduced adventure weekend
